Basics

print() function:

print('hello world')
hello world
print("welcome to data science")
welcome to data science

Printing Multiple Pieces of Data

?print
print("hello", 'world')# this will print the value to the output
hello world
print(50, 1000, 3.142, "Hello World")
50 1000 3.142 Hello World
print("hello world" + "!") #concatenatiing two strings
hello world!

By default, each print statement prints text in a new line. If we want multiple print statements to print in the same line, we can use the following code:

print() # in jupyter: shift+tab(4)
print("Hello")
print("World")
######################
Hello
World
print("Hello", end="")
print("World")
######################
HelloWorld
print("Hello", end=" ")
print("World")
Hello World
print("welcome", "to", "python", sep="_", end=";")
welcome_to_python;
print("welcome", "to", "python", sep="_", end=";")  #instead of new line we have been added ;
print("data science") # its by default new line will be the end of this code line
print("technology")
welcome
_to_python;data science
technology
print("welcome", "to", "python", sep="_", end="$")
print("data science")
welcome_to_python$data science
print("welcome", "to", "python", sep="_", end="\n") # end with new line(by default)
print("data science")
welcome_to_python
data science

comment with # and ''' symbols:

Single Line Comment:

    # this statement will print the value inside in it
    print("welcome to data science")
welcome to data science
# hello
'''hello'''
'hello'
'''
this statement will print the factorial of the number we
gave from math module
'''
import math # module
math.factorial(5) # printed the factorial of 5 here
120
'''
this statement will print the statement inside in it
we can use print function and write sentense or values
inside within the unction
Other Statement
'''
'\nthis statement will print the statement inside in it\nwe can use print function and write sentense or values\ninside within the unction\nOther Statement\n'
print('''
this statement will print the statement inside in it
we can use print function and write sentense or values
inside within the unction
Other Statement
''')

this statement will print the statement inside in it
we can use print function and write sentense or values
inside within the unction
Other Statement
